snippet.title: KIWAYA - trailer
snippet.description:
KIWAYA is an action exploration game.
Every in game day you receive a mission, with occasionally a weird weapon.
Your goal is to reach the target within the given time.

Itch.io: https://rogerty.itch.io/kiwaya
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1224010/KIWAYA/

Follow me on Twitter: @rogertygames
